channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IL

item.title: Report X-2023120654
item.description:
Report X-2023120654

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-09T06:14:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-09
  • City: ROMEOVILLE
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet, leaking a red liquid. The PH tagging on bank 3 called out for QA for assistance. Package was picked up and was taken off the warehouse floor and isolated from the rest of the employees. Package did have Fully Regulated HazMat labeling for Corrosive materials. DescribePack: The one plastic container inside had its cap badly bent to the side, which caused Hazardous Materials to leak. Upon investigation the container did not have any safety seal underneath to prevent leaks. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was taken to the HazMat Cage for isolation and processing.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: The cap loosened and caused the contents to spill out and leaked in the box that lead to the box breaking. DescribePack: the caps weren't tightened correctly DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: we moved the hazardus material to our hazmat cage away from being able to harm anyone and put the contents in a drum so it didn't get all over while we wait to process this report.

item.title: Report X-2023120834
item.description:
Report X-2023120834

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-12
  • City: WHEELING
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found when unloading a van. Package was wet and leaking. Package was removed from operation area and taken to Hazmat Cage for processing. Any spill was cleaned up and materials used were brought to Hazmat cage. DescribePack: loose caps and seals on inner bottles DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: As soon as package was discovered leaking it was removed from the area and taken to Hazmat cage

item.title: Report X-2023121089
item.description:
Report X-2023121089

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-12
  • City: ADDISON
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: LOADER NOTICED WET SPOT FROM PACKAGE. CALLED FOR SUPERVISOR. SUPERVISOR CALLED FOR DESIGNATED RESPONDER. DESIGNATED RESPONDER ARRIVED AT SCENE WITH PROPER EQUIPMENT ON AND SPILL CART AND DECISION TREE. DESIGNATED RESPONDER RESPONDED PROPERLY TO THE PACKAGE WITH NO TROUBLES.
